data.description:
Found a video that your friend would enjoy? Meet up in Bonsai Desk and watch it together. Build together with blocks using hand tracked physics while your video is playing.

Trailer Music: Creatures From the Swamp (deep-drone) via https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

changelog.change_log:
- spawned builds now have realistic weight distribution
- bearings now have friction
- structures with many bearings are less likely to continuously gain momentum

Blocks
- bearings
- block textures
- block menu with duplicate, save, break single, break chunk
- save block builds locally
- publish you locally saved block builds
- like and download other peoples' builds

Features
- notifications for public rooms
- save settings like lights and pinch pull
- change the way you open menus
- other peoples hands now disappear when they lose tracking
- fade hand when menu is open
- added an Easter egg
- structures now freeze while attaching block

De-Jank
- controllers don't get stuck in your face
- block are less likely to freak out
- user teleport is instant when you change layout
- blocks no longer get stuck flying away
- more error messages when things go wrong
- hands less likely to get stuck in table
- objects reset velocity when they reset teleport
- prevent interacting with blocks when menu open
- screen no long deletes itself sometimes
- Added license information for public distribution
